name: Shell Advance VSX 2 (FC/EGD)

globalDocs.name: Advance VSX 2 (FC/EGD) (undyed prediluted) EN TDG V1.4 24-Oct-2018

localDocs.name: Advance VSX 2 (FC/EGD) (undyed prediluted) Ireland EN 140007731156 EHS V2.5 12-APR-2023

globalSpecs.name: JASO FC - Meets smoke emission standard

marketing: Shell Advance VSX 2 is a synthetic based lubricant specifically designed for excellent engine protection and performance in 2-stroke motorcycle engines. It guarantees superior control against exhaust system blocking and minimises exhaust smoke. Shell Advance VSX 2 is suitable both for all oil-injection and premix systems and exceeds the requirements of leading manufacturers.
